plot: Sayuri Haruno is a young girl who dreams of opening her own pastry shop. She attends an elite confectionery school called Fleurir Academy on a scholarship she earned. There she meets several charming young men who have each specialized in a variety of sweets such as French pastries and Japanese sweets (wagashi). Despite the hardships she faces in the Academy, Sayuri is determined to graduate and make her dream come true.
ending_theme: "Yasashisa o Tsutsumikonde" (優しさを包み込んで) by Kaito Ishikawa & Tetsuya Kakihara (eps 2-12)
"Dochira ni Suru no?" (どちらにするの？) by Ryohei Kimura & Hikaru Midorikawa
